explanations.machine learning: The abstract explicitly mentions machine learning (ML) as a transformative technology in the financial industry.
explanations.reinforcement learning: The paper discusses Deep Reinforcement Learning (Deep RL) as one of the key deep learning models.
explanations.deep learning: The abstract focuses on deep learning (DL) as a subset of ML and discusses various deep learning models.
explanations.neural network: The paper covers several types of neural networks, including CNNs, LSTMs, and DBNs.
explanations.representation learning: Deep learning inherently involves representation learning, which is implied by the discussion of deep learning models.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The abstract mentions Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) as one of the key deep learning models.
explanations.CNN: CNN is an abbreviation for Convolutional Neural Networks, which are discussed in the abstract.
explanations.recurrent neural network: LSTMs are a type of recurrent neural network, which is mentioned in the abstract.
explanations.long short-term memory: The abstract specifically mentions Long Short-Term Memory networks (LSTMs) as a key deep learning model.
explanations.LSTM: LSTM is an abbreviation for Long Short-Term Memory networks, which are discussed in the abstract.
explanations.deep belief network: The abstract mentions Deep Belief Networks (DBNs) as one of the key deep learning models.
explanations.DBM: DBM likely refers to Deep Boltzmann Machines, which are related to Deep Belief Networks (DBNs) mentioned in the abstract.
